entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
